author: cbc
title: Man charged with 1st-degree murder in death of former wife appears in court
text:
A 32-year-old Saskatchewan man charged with first-degree murder in the death of his former wife made a brief appearance in court Tuesday.
Steven Lewis is accused in the shooting of Stacey Lewis, who was 27, in Hudson Bay, Sask., on Friday.
Man charged with 1st-degree murder in Hudson Bay, Sask., woman's death Officers responding to a report of a shooting found Stacey dead in a home in the northeastern Saskatchewan community.
Sherry Pilon, a councillor in Hudson Bay, said the two used to be married and shared custody of a daughter and son.
Steven is set to appear again in Melfort provincial court via video link on March 14.
